document.full_text: a u.s. judge has largely sided with oracle corp  over how several technical terms will be defined in its patent fight over google's  android software, according to a tentative ruling.
document.title: judge sides with oracle over patent language
lines_and_colors: a u.s. judge has largely sided with oracle corp  over how several technical terms will be defined in its patent fight over google's  android software, according to a tentative ruling.
